credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave foundation
description:
Bands of alphabets are followed by floral vine borders and the inscription: 
Alice Pearlee Born September (?) 1745  This sampler I wrought the year 1759
Goodness and mercy ever follow those who share there ...(?) by God's holy laws

The lower section shows a basket of flowers flanked by trees, deer and other animals.
name: Sampler
